Description: Frame of fragments of a hieratic religious text in red and black ink (two columns).
Curator's comments: Part of EA10051 (pSalt 825), Herbin, in BIFAO 88, 95–112.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57505) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57505)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fragmentary, fractured, delaminating Black ink Red ink Backed: brown paper Transferred to horizontal storage 31 JAN 95 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (cracked, warped) Sandwich: board Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: C Overall Condition: C
Associated titles: Ritual for the Preservation of Life
